segments.text: Hello , Mr . Wang . I am glad to meet you here at the fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Like wise . Take a seat , please . How about a cup of tea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Thank you . It seems your business is prosperous . There are many customers here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's not too bad . Our sales are going up year after year . And we still have a large potential production capacity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what do you think of choosing a commission representative or agent abroad to promote your sales ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . So far , we have several agents abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are willing to be your agent in Thailand for hand-held tools . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , what's your usual commission rate for your agents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually , we give a commission of 4 % to our agents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 4 % is too low , I think . You see , we have a lot of work to do in sales promotion , such as advertising on radio or TV , printing booklets , leaflets , catalogues and so on . It all costs money , 4 % is not enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . We'll allow you a higher commission rate if your sales score a substantial increase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds OK . Then how do you pay the commission ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We may deduct the commission from the invoice value directly or remit it to you after payment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . If it's okay , we would like to sign an agency agreement with you immediately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Think it over . We hope to keep a good business relationship with you .
segments.speaker: S1
